title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is selected
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText emits a beep sound when the SWT.MULTI option is chosen. This behavior is not expected.
OB: When the SWT.MULTI option is selected in the ControlExampleText, a bell sound is heard. Additionally, clicking on other buttons also triggers the bell sound.
EB: When the SWT.MULTI option is selected in the ControlExampleText, a Windows 'ding' sound is heard. This behavior signifies that an incorrect action has been performed.
SR:
1. Launch the ControlExampleText application.
2. Select the SWT.MULTI option.
3. Observe the bell sound being emitted.
4. Click on other buttons and observe that the bell sound is heard again.
